nodes.text: Bagrila Industries was a business that was active during the Clone Wars. In 21 BBY, Senator Padmé Amidala of the Galactic Republic attempted to assemble a civilian fleet to assist in the liberation of the planet Lanteeb from the Confederacy of Independent Systems, and Bagrila Industries was one of a number of organizations that she attempted to secure support from in her endeavor. However, the director of Bagrila Industries did not accept a comm message from Amidala's protocol droid C-3PO.
